verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And we cry holy holy holy
And we cry holy holy holy
And we cry holy holy holy is the Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We fall down
We lay our crowns
At the feet of Jesus
The greatness of mercy and love
At the feet of Jesus
